column4: crap, i thought it was done dowloading the update...it was just starting
does the ubuntu server edition have a gui?
i don't know very much about linux, so installing a dedicated ftp server or something like that would be quite difficult without knowing my way around the whole setup
I'm sure it can. Have I seen it yet? Nope
In theory there is no reason why not
i like to mess around with mac osx, i'm learning linux, and i know xp like the back of my hand.
therefore, it would be nice to tri-boot
it's old, but it can run windows server 2k3 just fine, the only sucky thing is the 1 mb onboard video chip
what was that link you sent me in reference to setting up ubuntu server?
